description: * Now, keep track of all your personal medical information in one place.     * This application provides a fully organized database which can be totally controlled by you.     * My Medical Pro stores all your emergency medical information like contacts, physicians, Insurance profiles, allergies etc.     * Store all your family and friends medical information easily.     * Fast access the entire information when you visit the doctors.     * Doctors can use this application to maintain all the information about their patients.    FEATURES:     * Get alert when you have Doctor appointments.      * Keep track of all the medical information.     * Send your medical information through Email.     * Password protected.     * Grab the Profile or contact information from your Blackberry contacts.     * Store an unlimited number of           o Emergency Contacts           o General Information           o Medications           o Surgeries           o Physicians           o Past Medications           o Lab Tests & Procedures           o Recent visits           o Hospitalizations           o Diagnoses           o Allergies           o Immunizations           o Family History           o Insurance Profiles
